name: Name of the unit of Measure Record that will be added/updated.  Each unitName field will be added as a separate line matched to this name.
unitname: The name of the unit under the units sublist.
pluralname: The plural name of the unit of measure.
abbreviation: The abbreviation of the singular name.
pluralabbreviation: The abbreviation of the plural name.
conversionrate: The conversion rate of the unit of measure.
inuse: Whether or not the current unit of measure is in use.
baseunit: Is the the base unit for the units type? The first unit name in a unit type MUST be the base unit for that unit type. Not doing so will cause this to fail.
ss_error_col: Leave this blank. This is used to sort error lines when errors are returned.
